sources.title: Lost in the Stratosphere
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Lost in the Stratosphere (1934) MILITARY DRAMA
sources.description:
Stars: William Cagney, Edward J. Nugent, June Collyer
Director: Melville W. Brown

Two military pilots are close friends, and share in a lot of hazardous missions while engaging in a series of good-natured romantic rivalries. But when one of the pilots loses a girl he really cared for, he cannot forgive his friend. Soon afterwards, they must work together on their most dangerous mission yet.

sources.title: Lost In The Stratosphere (1934) Action, Adventure, Comedy B movie
